CustomField.formula:
IF( TEXT($User.LanguageLocaleKey) = "da",
CASE(ProductCode, "16400","Spærring 3G Indstillinger", "16401","Spærring 4G Indstillinger", "16402","Spærring Data Services", "16403","Spærring International", "16404","Spærring MMS", "16405","Spærring National og Internat. Roaming", "16406","Forbrugskontrol", "16407","Spær alle indgående opkald", "16408","Spær alle udgående opkald", "16409","Spær indg. opkald i udlandet", "16410","Spær indholdstakseret SMS" , "16411","Spær opkald til 90 numre" , "16412","Spær udg. fra udl. undt til DK", "16413","Spær udg. opkald fra udlandet" , "16414","Spær udg. opkald til int. nr" , "16415","Standard GSM Spærring", "16416","Spær alle opkald", "not found") , CASE(ProductCode , "16400","Barring 3G settings" , "16401","Barring 4G settings", "16402","Barring data services", "16403","Barring International Roaming", "16404","Barring MMS" , "16405","Barring National & Intl roaming", "16406","Owner Control", "16407","Barring all incoming calls", "16408","Barring all outbound calls", "16409","Barring Inbound International calls", "16410","Barring Naughty SMS services", "16411","Barring Exotic Hotline calls", "16412","Barring outgoing calls from abroad except to Denmark", "16413","Barring outgoing calls from abroad", "16414","Barring outgoing International calls", "16415","Standard GSM Barring" , "16416","Total Barring of calls", "yay"))
